sense.name: Change to ice or ice-like form, be cold, anesthetize
sense.examples: The water in the bowl froze. Freeze the leftover food. Water freezes at 32 degrees. Your doctor may use liquid nitrogen to freeze the wart. I could freeze in this office with the air conditioning on.

sense.name: Stop dead, suspend
sense.examples: When he saw the police car he froze. US House votes to freeze aid to Vietnam. Freeze the assets of this hostile government. She froze when she saw her ex-husband.
